description:
Showcase of a Custom Multi Scope Schema-Validator executed in the cluster.

It will check that Name_1 is unique (case insensitive) and that Name_2 is unique (case sensitive) across all hosts.

For the Java implementation check out [ExampleMultiScopeSchemaValidatorSchema.java](https://bitbucket.lab.dynatrace.org/projects/RX/repos/cluster/browse/shared/settings.monitoring.impl/src/main/java/com/dynatrace/settings/monitoring/impl/internalapi/schemas/customvalidation/ExampleMultiScopeSchemaValidatorSchema.java)

multiScopeUniqueCaseInsensitiveName.description: A unique (case-insensitive) name in the whole environment.

uniqueName.description: A unique name in the whole environment.
